alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:06PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Charlotte and northwestern Lee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charlotte County Airport, or near Punta Gorda, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Punta Gorda, Charlotte County Airport, Burnt Store Marina, Pirate Harbor, Solana, Tropical Gulf Acres, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland and Charlotte Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte
